name: Zombie Virus Apocalypse
description:
A cloud of smoke entailed by a number of zombies is apocalyptic scenario. The Mutant Web Hero sets out to solve this mystery of zombie virus and put a stop to the villains behind it. Time is running out for our amazing mutant hero, how will he stop this virus epidemic?

Embark on a journey with the amazing web shooting hero as he fights the forces of evil and protects the city from zombies. Use your fists or shoot web to stop the chaos of evil spreading in the city.

FEATURES:
• Fight zombies as your life depends on it
• Use instinctive fighting skills to stop the virus
• A thrilling and mystery-filled story
• Amazingly smooth controls
• Investigate the mystery of green smoke in the city
• Stunning HD Graphics
• Free to play forever
• Action and thrilling music and sound effects
• No In-App Purchases
• No Wi-Fi required
and much more…
